cgv.title: Terms and Conditions
cgv.subtitle: Terms governing the use of the CertiPet platform
cgv.importantText: These terms and conditions govern all transactions made on the CertiPet platform. By using our services, you accept these terms.
cgv.article1Text: These terms and conditions govern the contractual relationships between CertiPet and its users in the context of pet sales.
cgv.article1Point1: Connection between certified breeders and buyers
cgv.article1Point3: Verification of legal compliance of sales
cgv.article2Text: Animal prices are freely set by breeders. CertiPet takes a commission on each transaction.
cgv.commissionText: A 5% commission is automatically deducted from the total amount of each sale and deducted from the payment made to the breeder.
cgv.article3Text: Payments are secured by an escrow system. Funds are released only after confirmation of animal delivery.
cgv.article4Text: Breeders commit to providing healthy animals with all required legal documents (veterinary certificates, microchips, etc.).
cgv.article5Text: Buyers commit to caring for acquired animals and respecting the sale conditions established by the breeder.
cgv.article6Text: In case of dispute, parties commit to seeking an amicable solution. Otherwise, French courts will have jurisdiction.

charter.title: Usage Charter
charter.subtitle: Our commitments to animal welfare and ethics
charter.missionText: CertiPet is committed to promoting responsible breeding and animal welfare through an ethical and transparent platform.
charter.animalWelfareText: Animal welfare is our absolute priority. We require all our breeders to respect the highest standards.
charter.healthCertificatesText: All animals must be accompanied by veterinary certificates attesting to their good health.
charter.vaccinationsText: Animals must be up to date with their vaccinations according to the appropriate veterinary schedule.
charter.breederResponsibilitiesText: Our certified breeders commit to respecting high standards of breeding and care.
charter.buyerCommitmentsText: Buyers commit to providing a loving and responsible home for animals.
charter.buyerPoint1: Provide a safe and suitable environment
charter.prohibitedPracticesText: The following practices are strictly prohibited on our platform:
charter.prohibited1: Sale of sick or unweaned animals
charter.prohibited4: Resale of animals for commercial purposes
charter.sanctionsText: Any breach of this charter may result in suspension or permanent exclusion from the platform.
charter.commitmentText: CertiPet is committed to enforcing this charter and promoting ethical and responsible breeding for the welfare of all animals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data - GDPR Compliance
privacy.rgpdComplianceText: This privacy policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and details how we collect, use and protect your personal data.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect different types of data to provide you with our services optimally.
privacy.dataUsageText: Your data is used exclusively for the following purposes:
privacy.usage1: Provision and improvement of our services
privacy.usage3: Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations
privacy.dataSharingText: We never sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.dataSharingWarning: Your data may be shared only with our trusted partners for payment processing and delivery, in strict respect of confidentiality.
privacy.userRightsText: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.rightAccessText: You can request access to all your personal data that we hold.
privacy.rightRectificationText: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacy.rightErasureText: You can request deletion of your data under certain conditions.
privacy.rightPortabilityText: You can request transfer of your data to another service.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to improve your user experience and analyze the use of our site.
privacy.contactText: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding data protection:
